title: JavaScript Basics Quiz
description: A quiz to test your basic knowledge of JavaScript.

questions.statement: Which keyword is used to declare a variable in JavaScript?
Which of the following is NOT a JavaScript data type?
What is the result of `typeof null` in JavaScript?

title: Data Structures Quiz
description: Covers fundamental concepts of data structures.

questions.statement: Which data structure uses FIFO principle?
Which sorting algorithm has O(n log n) complexity in average case?

title: System Design Advanced Quiz
description: A hard-level quiz testing your understanding of scalable system design.

questions.statement: Which database is best suited for handling graph-based queries?
What is the purpose of a load balancer?
In CAP theorem, what does 'P' stand for?
